title: Flash Furniture 2 Pack HERCULES Series Black Vertical Back Metal Restaurant Chair - Cherry Wood Seat
features: Pack of 2: Great style is always in fashion and this metal restaurant dining chair will be the "little black dress" of your decor ensemble. Simple upkeep and proper care can ensure this metal dining chair remains in prime condition.
18 gauge steel frame holds up to 500 lb. weight capacity
Vertical back design with cherry finished wood seat
Contemporary metal dining chair designed for commercial use, suitable for home use
PRODUCT MEASUREMENTS: Overall Size: 17"W x 20.25"D x 34.25"H; Seat Size: 16.25"W x 16.5"D x 17.25"H; Back Size: 16.5"W x 16.75"H
description: Create a first-rate dining experience by offering your patrons great food, service and attractive furnishings. This metal chair with cherry wood seat is a popular choice for furnishing dining spaces in restaurants, cafes, pool halls, lounges, bars and other high traffic establishments. This chair is easy to clean, which is an important aspect when it comes to a business. This chair was designed to withstand the daily rigors in the hospitality industry, but will also provide a chic look to your home. The durable frame is stabilized with welded joint assembly. The floor glides help protect your floors and ensure smooth gliding. The simple, lightweight design makes this metal chair an ideal seating solution for residential or commercial grade use.
